title: Cheesy mince pasta bake
ingredients: ['500g pasta shells', '450g minced beef', '1 small onion, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '75g sliced pepperoni', '500g passata', '450ml tomato juice', '3/4 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon celery salt', '1/4 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon dried basil', '1/8 teaspoon crushed red chillies', '250g grated mozzarella cheese']
